Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

OOC: Logo says that shes terrible at male characters, so she gave me 
Starscream and Vulois.  If any of you dont beleive me, E-mail her. Im 
basically guessing about there whereabouts, so bear with me.  tell me if 
anythings wrong.  None of the memories in this are moding. they really 
happened.

:::Vulois/Starscream:::

::Vulois was in the cave, thinking about things.  He had regained his old 
memory, and thought about everything that happened in his life on this world. 
 He remembered when he first came, a messenger from the matrix.  Evil.  He 
contacted Predacons to join his group.  The first to answer his call was 
Soundwave.  Soundwave came to his mountain lair and became a TM3.  Soon 
Vulois and Soundwave became very good friends.  battera also joined him.  
After he failed his treachery against Hell Beast, he built an embassy and 
turned over a new leaf.  he decided to strive for peace.  By this time, 
Battera had joined the Destrons along with Cybershark.  Soundwave was left in 
his quarters, thinking that Vulois had died.  Vulois contacted his three 
friends and they came promptly to him.  he then assigned them factions for 
peace talks.  Battera went with the Maximals and became almost part of them.  
Cybershark had very little luck with the Predacons.  Soundwave went to the 
Alliance.  While Soundwave was there, Vulois went into a meditation state, 
and when he woke up, he discovered that Soundwave had been brutally killed by 
the Alliance.  many things happened after that.  he trained a young bot named 
Child, the Skyscorchers joined him, Eagle Eye died, GuardienAngel and 
AngelNemises were destroyed, and many other strange things.  Leading up to 
him faking his own death and joining the Alliance.  Now he didnt know how he 
feeled.  He opened up his comm::
Vulois: Battera, Cybershark, would you please come to my coordinates so we 
can discuss some things?
------------------------------------------------------------------------------

---------------------------------------------
::Starscream was flying around, wondering what had happened to his comrades.  
Soon his energy signature detector went off::
Computer: Kitkat's energy signature detected.
::He flies down and transforms to robot mode.  he walks up to Kitkat::
Starscream: Kitkat!  Im sorry for disapeering like that, but, WHAT HAS 
HAPPENED WHILE I WAS GONE?

--part1_77.c24369a.27449d6b_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"

ecame almost part of them.  <BR>Cybershark had very little luck with the Predacons.  Soundwave went to the <BR>Alliance.  While Soundwave was there, Vulois went into a meditation state, <BR>and when he woke up, he discovered that Soundwave had been brutally killed by <BR>the Alliance.  many things happened after that.  he trained a young bot named <BR>Child, the Skyscorchers joined him, Eagle Eye died, GuardienAngel and <BR>AngelNemises were destroyed, and many other strange things.  Leading up to <BR>him faking his own death and joining the Alliance.  Now he didnt know how he <BR>feeled.  He opened up his comm::
